basics.name: Yashas.N
basics.label: Mathematics Student
basics.summary: After four years of dedicated mathematics training, I have developed a strong understanding of fundamental concepts and their underlying principles. This knowledge has equipped me with the ability to approach and solve problems effectively, teach and clarify complex ideas to others, and contribute to fostering a positive and collaborative academic environment.

education.institution: M. S. RAMAIAH UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES
courses: machine learning, numerical analysis, differential geometry, number theory, fluid mechanics, algebra, analysis and statistics.
highlights: Submitted Master Thesis on Arithmetic properties of (l,m)-regular colored partitions.
Learnt Machine learning algorithms and concepts that work behind these.
To my best efforts and academic performance I was awarded Gold Medal from Faculty of Natural Sciences M.S. Ramaiah University of Applied Sciences.

courses: analysis, group theory, differential equations, modern physics,electronics and general chemistry.
highlights: Did my bachelors thesis/course work on Paradoxes in Mathematics.
